Text: thanks man, had to miss the event today.. this a .TS file too? never seen that extension before hope its aight
I really mean it, though.  You seem to be the ONLY one who capped this, and I was really looking forward to it.  Not on that, but you (always) do so in amazing quality.  Good man!

@saffronsghost

Well, I love MMA and it's still not recognized by many people in many places in the world. Gotta help spread it. No one else does so in a normal fashion in the pirate world. Everything becomes big and recognized now days through the internet, so the more available I make it, the more people know about it. In turn, they start supporting the industry and buying merchandise, tickets, etc. Anything to help MMA grow. The main objective to my account is uploading MMA. I do other stuff as well, but that's just for fun and when I'm bored.
Sec, really glad to see an uploader that has a passion for MMA as I do. Will be looking out for all your uploads!
